TopicTitle: Objects In Space - sim game with custom hardware

Articles.Content:
I just came across this video in my inbox, and thought "This looks like something the KSP forum might enjoy looking at"

Apparently a small group of people from Australia thought it was worth it to lug their experimental, under development, ultra-niche space sim game that absolutely requires custom physical control hardware to PAX East. I'm not sure how much of a chance it has to ever be finished and sold - but one thing I do know, and that is that I've never seen anything quite like it.
